mapper.select: SELECT sm.id, sm.code, sm.pcode, sm.name, sm.description, sm.permission, sm.url, sm.img, sm.level, sm.type, sm.visible FROM sys_menu sm WHERE sm.permission != 'anon' order by sm.sort ASC

SELECT t1.* FROM ( SELECT sm.id, sm.code, sm.pcode, sm.name, sm.description, sm.permission, sm.url, sm.img, sm.level, sm.type, sm.visible, sm.sort, sr.organization_id FROM sys_menu sm,sys_role_resource sr WHERE sm.code = sr.resource_id AND sr.type='m' AND sm.permission != 'anon' )t1, ( SELECT o2.id FROM sys_organization o1 LEFT JOIN sys_organization o2 ON o1.pid = o2.id WHERE o1.relation_id = #{0} )t2 WHERE t1.organization_id = t2.id ORDER BY t1.sort ASC
